description: This file defines a test case class for running a Python-related runtime test within the OEQA testing framework. It includes a method that tests if Python 3 is correctly installed and functioning by executing a simple rot13 encoding script.

classes.name: PythonTest
classes.description: A test case class that inherits from OERuntimeTestCase, implementing a test to verify Python 3 functionality.

methods.name: test_python3(self)
methods.description: Runs a Python 3 command that encodes a string with rot13 and checks the output to verify Python 3 is working properly.
